GDP per capita.label: GDP per capita (current US$)
GDP per capita.reason: Higher affluence generally correlates with investable surplus.

Gini coefficient.label: Income Gini coefficient (0–1)
Gini coefficient.reason: Lower inequality suggests a broader middle class base.

Disposable income.label: Median household disposable income (USD per month)
Disposable income.reason: Higher disposable income increases feasible savings rate.

Retail investor penetration.label: Retail investor penetration (% of adults)
Retail investor penetration.reason: Larger investing cohort lowers education cost and boosts uptake.

Islamic robo competitors.label: Islamic robo-advisory competition (qualitative)
Islamic robo competitors.reason: Scarcity implies first-mover advantages; crowding raises CAC.

Conventional robo penetration.label: Conventional robo penetration (AUM per capita, US$)

Digital maturity.label: Digital distribution maturity (qualitative)
Digital maturity.reason: Digital readiness reduces CAC and service costs.

Shariah-compliant instruments.label: Shariah-compliant listed instruments (qualitative or proxy count)
Shariah-compliant instruments.reason: Breadth of compliant ETFs/funds improves construction and liquidity.

Sukuk & mutual funds.label: Sukuk & Islamic mutual fund access (qualitative)
Sukuk & mutual funds.reason: Debt-like and fund wrappers expand conservative allocations.

Real estate crowdfunding.label: Real-estate crowdfunding availability & legal clarity (qualitative)
Real estate crowdfunding.reason: Clear frameworks enable fractional exposure without bespoke structures.

Ethical commodities.label: Ethically sourced gold/commodities infrastructure (qualitative)
Ethical commodities.reason: AAOIFI-aligned chains simplify compliant commodity allocation.

Clarity for Islamic Finance.label: Islamic finance regime clarity (qualitative)
Clarity for Islamic Finance.reason: National Shariah boards or accepted governance reduce uncertainty.

Licensing process.label: Robo licensing ease/transparency (qualitative)
Licensing process.reason: Predictable licensing timelines and clear rules speed up launch.

Regulatory stability.label: Regulatory stability (qualitative)
Regulatory stability.reason: Stable rule-making lowers operational and legal risk.

KYC providers.label: Digital KYC/AML providers (qualitative)
KYC providers.reason: Strong KYC vendors cut onboarding friction and fraud risk.

Physical setup cost.label: Physical presence cost (office/kiosk) (qualitative)
Physical setup cost.reason: High rent/fit-out increases burn; lower cost improves runway.

Brokers & custodians.label: Custody/broker/payment infrastructure (qualitative)
Brokers & custodians.reason: Mature rails reduce failures, spreads, and reconciliation costs.

Talent pool.label: Talent pool index (0=shallow & costly, 1=deep & efficient)
Talent pool.reason: Local fintech/data/compliance talent depth and cost effects.

Ethical investing culture.label: Responsible-investing culture & AUM (qualitative)
Ethical investing culture.reason: Norms and AUM signal appetite for values-based products.

Shariah finance attitudes.label: Attitudes toward Shariah-compliant investing (qualitative)
Shariah finance attitudes.reason: Acceptance of Shariah filters boosts trust and reduces friction.

Attitude towards Muslims.label: Social attitudes toward Muslims (qualitative)
Attitude towards Muslims.reason: Inclusion affects brand risk and tone of communications.

Digital adoption.label: Customer engagement preference (digital vs branches) (qualitative)
Digital adoption.reason: Higher digital comfort improves conversion and lowers service cost.
